abstract: Update | 8:32 p.m. A Delaware judge has rejected a request by a trust tied to Rohm & Haas‘s founding family to protect some of its members, including its 90-year-old former chairman, from depositions in its $15 billion legal battle with Dow Chemical over a foundering takeover bid.
lead_paragraph: Update | 8:32 p.m. A Delaware judge has rejected a request by a trust tied to Rohm & Haas‘s founding family to protect some of its members, including its 90-year-old former chairman, from depositions in its $15 billion legal battle with Dow Chemical over a foundering takeover bid.

headline.main: Judge Rejects Plea to Shield Haas Family
